body_text:
This depends on a pending PR for product_details that fixes it in
Python 3 and up.
PR is at mozilla/django-product-details#54. I got this working locally by just setup.py installing my local copy of product-details.
@mythmon r? Might want to wait for the product_details change to land. This also wipes out our migrations, but I think that's fine at this stage. Otherwise I kept hitting a migration issue that made no sense that I couldn't figure out.

Python 3 and up.

PR is at mozilla/django-product-details#54. I got this working locally by just setup.py installing my local copy of product-details.

@mythmon r? Might want to wait for the product_details change to land. This also wipes out our migrations, but I think that's fine at this stage. Otherwise I kept hitting a migration issue that made no sense that I couldn't figure out.
title: Store product_details locales in the database.
body:
This depends on a pending PR for product_details that fixes it in
Python 3 and up.

PR is at https://github.com/mozilla/django-product-details/pull/54. I got this working locally by just `setup.py install`ing my local copy of product-details.

@mythmon r? Might want to wait for the product_details change to land. This also wipes out our migrations, but I think that's fine at this stage. Otherwise I kept hitting a migration issue that made no sense that I couldn't figure out.
